title: Madhopur Ninaiya
text:
Madhopur Ninaiya is a village in <a href="Salon%2C%20India">Salon</a> block of <a href="Rae%20Bareli%20district">Rae Bareli district</a>, <a href="Uttar%20Pradesh">Uttar Pradesh</a>, <a href="India">India</a>. It is located 7 km from Salon, the block and <a href="tehsil">tehsil</a> headquarters. As of 2011, Madhopur Ninaiya has a population of 1,534 people, in 296 households. It has one primary school and no healthcare facilities, and it does not host a permanent market or a periodic <a href="haat">haat</a>.
The <a href="1961%20Census%20of%20India">1961 census</a> recorded Madhopur Ninaiya as comprising 3 hamlets, with a total population of 586 people (310 male and 276 female), in 122 households and 119 physical houses. The area of the village was given as 568 <a href="acre">acre</a>s.
The <a href="1981%20Census%20of%20India">1981 census</a> recorded Madhopur Ninaiya as having a population of 747 people, in 200 households, and having an area of 231.48 <a href="hectare">hectare</a>s. The main staple foods were given as wheat and <a href="juwar">juwar</a>.
